IDinCache

public boolean IDinCache(java.lang.String id)
Is the specified id in the database already? (relationship="ID" and valueTerm=id) id should be in the form "Authority:2349789"

Parameters:
id - the fully qualified ID to look for
Returns:
true if it's already there, false if not (or on SQL error)

addWholeTerm

public boolean[] addWholeTerm(edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Term term)
Add a Term and it's contents to the database. Checks for existence of the term or it's constituent TermRelationships before attempting insertion. Returns true if the term is in the db (was there already or was inserted), false otherwise

Parameters:
term - Term object to be added to the db
Returns:
boolean array for existence of the Term and TermRelationships

addRelationship

public boolean addRelationship(edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.TermRelationship tr)
Add a relationship to the database. Checks for existence of the relationship before attempting insertion. Automatically inserts terms into Terms table if they're absent. Returns true if the relationship is in the db (was there already or was inserted), false otherwise

Parameters:
tr - new TermRelationship
Returns:
boolean for existence of the TermRelationship in the db

Returns:

getAllRelationships

public java.util.ArrayList<edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.TermRelationship> getAllRelationships(java.lang.String term)
Convenience method for getRelationshipsBySource(String, String) where source = "all".

Parameters:
term - String term
Returns:
ArrayList of all TermRelationships pertaining to term, regardless of source

getTerm

public edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Term getTerm(java.lang.String termQuery,
                                                          java.lang.String source)
Get a complete Term object from the database. Tests for whether the primary term exists in the database first (though, ideally, this should be done before this method is called). If it doesn't exist, null is returned. If the term is present then all relationships that originated from the specified source ("all" for all sources) are gathered and added to the Term, which is returned.

Parameters:
termQuery - String, the desired term (searched exactly)
source - String, resource name to match
Returns:
complete Term (null on error or no term found)

getTerm

public edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Term getTerm(java.lang.String termQuery)
Same as getTerm(String, String), but conveniently specifies "all" for source.

Parameters:
termQuery - String, the desired term (searched exactly)
Returns:
complete Term (null on error or no term found)

getTermByID

public edu.cmu.lti.oaqa.bio.resource_wrapper.Term getTermByID(java.lang.String id,
                                                              java.lang.String source)
Retrieves the complete Term object corresponding to the supplied ID

Parameters:
id - fully-qualified String ID e.g. "Authority:236789"
source - String name of the source to retrieve from, "all" for all
Returns:
complete Term object
